website_summaries.verdict: The BMX tire to choose when you want more grip for better off-road performance.
pros: Features a unique, aggressive tread pattern to cut deep into loose terrain and soil when riding on trails
Kevlar layer adds protection against punctures
Shoulder lugs keep the tire connected to the ground during high-speed cornering and tricks
Folds up for easy storage when used as a spare
cons: Does not provide the speed performance of slick tires

customer_reviews.title: Used for traction on kids power wheels.
customer_reviews.text: purchased these since they were cheapest tires could find. Bought to cover my kids power wheels tires that seemed to have no traction and wore down fast. You need to cut the metal liners our of each side, which is the tough part. Then screw these into the power wheels tires as flat as possible with short screws and your kids will be blazing around in no time with much better traction and no more expensive replacing power wheel tires. I have done a power wheels dune racer and a mustang with good results.
customer_reviews.author: Mope

customer_reviews.title: Great - does the job
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my young sons bike. His treads were pretty worn down, even though he typically just rides on the sidewalk. These seemed much more durable than the original ones that came with his bike. They seems incredibly durable and have a really thick tread. The only downside to this is that it treks a lot of mud in the garage. I can't say how these would hold up for "true" BMX'ers, but for my son's youth sized bike, it was perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lister

customer_reviews.title: Used for power wheels
customer_reviews.text: Have been screwing these into plastic power wheels tires for better traction and keeping them from wearing so fast and needing replaced. Result is crazy good traction and stoping but may result in slightly reduced speed. Speed issue can be fixed by upping battery voltage :)
customer_reviews.author: Mope

customer_reviews.title: Power wheels can drive anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a power wheels car. Cut the sidewalk and put them over the wheel. Works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Us here

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for replacement of tires on a Rubbermaid garden cart
customer_reviews.text: Combined with  and it's a perfect fit for replacement of tires on a Rubbermaid garden cart # FG564200BLA with 20" x 2.125" plastic wheels. At about 10% ($12 each) of the cost of new Rubbermaid wheels with tires (about $100 + shipping). Hard to install, but they're working out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Liazard

customer_reviews.title: Good Street Tire for Casual Riding
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Frankly, the tire I received was pretty narrow and a little on the flimsy side. Since it was going on a 20" kids bike I felt like it was durable enough but I would not call this a true BMX tire which would need a wider and knobbier tread. For the money, I think you can do much better. Again, if this is for a bike that's only for neighborhood riding it should be adequate and safe. I would not recommend it for someone trail riding or competing in BMX.
customer_reviews.author: Dutton and Beth Armstrong, Editors

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for quality product and quick delivery,but thumbs down for misrepresenting product
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine because I've bought these kind of tires before. The problem is that the tires I ordered in the picture are not what's showing up on my doorstep. They show street tires but I have received 2 sets of dirt bike tires which is not what my son wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sincity

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal!
customer_reviews.text: Best deal for the price (6.98 when I ordered). Made my son's bike look brand new, and he fell in love with it again! Already ordered more for our other son's bike. Be aware: 1. A little heavy, but also heavy-duty 2. Be aware it raises the bike a little higher than most tires (in our case it sat about 1" higher off the ground) once inflated, but in our case that was a benefit. We lowered his seat and his bike will fit him longer than it would have, and it increased his pedal clearance from the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen E

customer_reviews.title: just ok,
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 20" Black, it is suppose to be universal width size for 1.75 to 2.25, well it really is just a 1.95, which is ok unless you are wanting wider than 2". I was hoping it was going to be wider than what it is, In the photo it looks wider, and tread depth is not that deep. So I would say this tire is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: fire105

customer_reviews.title: Not the Flat Defense tire advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I'm highly aggravated that I ordered this from Amazon.com specifically so I could get the Flat defense knobby tire to match the one on the front of the bike and that is NOT the tire I got. Unfortunately my daughter needed her bike by tomorrow or I would send this back. I'm a little upset right now.
customer_reviews.author: Brain

customer_reviews.title: Golf Push Cart restoration!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace the tires on my Sun Mountain golf push cart. Great fit, quality rubber, easy to install. I bought the 12” Bell tubes to go with them and they worked as expected. Not much else to say. A great tire for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Logan H.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and fit great . I installed it on my ebike and it work out great. Was a little bigger then the last tire. But work out great just had to move the fender up. But is rides nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sharuto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Tire is giving excellent traction and durability on our grandson's bicycle. The tread pattern has provided excellent wear for the rough riding that the bicycles are subjected to.
customer_reviews.author: BJS

customer_reviews.title: easy fit/install
customer_reviews.text: honestly, the ONLY reason these tires (replacements for my granddaughters bike...who loves to skid/slide) did not receive 5 stars is I would have preferred at least double the amount of tread pattern. But you can't beat the price (I shopped online & local big boxes)...nicely packaged...can only hope the Kevlar layer helps little miss hot rod, but you can definitely feel/see it.
customer_reviews.author: TexasIndian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good price
customer_reviews.text: As long as you get the correct size, this is a good quality tire. I didn't have any issues installing this and it was quick and easy. Good price compared to others I saw online and in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Banet

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My son wore through his old bike tire. I bought this and put it on his bike. It was easy to install and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: these are soooo much more at wallmart. Bought one new, one "like new", lol. Great deal. Went on easy, smooth rollers.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Item was as expected. Competitive pricing. It did have an odor and a film on my hands when handling the tire. Just wash hands well.
customer_reviews.author: Pa,m

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Way heavier than what comes stock on a huffy. Not even in the same league. Highly reccamend, will buy more the next time we upgrade the kids’ bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Good thick tread, compared to the tires the bike came with these things have heft and are nice and firm. Took about 8 minutes to do both wheels. They look good on boy's little bmx bike.
customer_reviews.author: David Brunner

customer_reviews.title: NO SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that I looked up a 20" tire reviewed and purchased a 20" tire then recieved a 14" tire . Out of and $18 purchase I get a $6 refund due to all the shipping cost . This is total BS , I have no way of knowing how this mistake happened but I definitely know I wouldn't have ordered a 14" tire that I have no use for.
customer_reviews.author: Dacre53

customer_reviews.title: Good knobby tire for dirt or street.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality BMX tire (thick knobby tread as shown, fine for on or off road riding as kids are likely to do). I buy a lot of these for the bikes that I refurbish for an orphanage in Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Works well but hard to fit
customer_reviews.text: Changing tires are an easy job...until you got these awesome tires. I have to apply silicone grease on the tires edge to make them mount. I tried without the grease for more than 20 minutes with no success
customer_reviews.author: Pascal B

customer_reviews.title: It rolls
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and inexpensive tire replacement if you have children who refuse to heed your advice when it comes to not skidding when they stop. My cretins go through these things like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: michaelsean

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: It fit what I wanted it to fit. Works excellent
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW BETRIX

customer_reviews.title: replace front wheel on graco jogger
customer_reviews.text: I used this to change the front tire on a graco jogger. it's a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit on the bike, easy standard tire installation. Seems to be wearing well with the grandkids useage
customer_reviews.author: PaPaMonkeys

customer_reviews.title: selected 20" - they sent 14"
customer_reviews.text: The product description and selection isn't working correctly. It said they were sending the 20" but sent the 14".
customer_reviews.author: L-Z

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find size. Works well, not as aggressive as I'd like, but like I said, hard to find size.
customer_reviews.author: Airborne

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Good repacement tire for cheap price. Tire was not packaged same as other tire I received making it very easy to spot it as open box product. Tires were still good and as described
customer_reviews.author: Sitt

customer_reviews.title: Good and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great for street and dirt , mostly got these for dirt jumps , and so far grips great. However these are a little on the the skinny side for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle v Niekerk

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tire to replace my sons worn out tire. Did the trick just fine. Good quality tire that arrived quickly and as described.
customer_reviews.author: D. Archibald

customer_reviews.title: very flimsy tire with very little sidewall strength. I ...
customer_reviews.text: very flimsy tire with very little sidewall strength. I would only use this for casual riding. I wouldn't trust it to hold up to any off road or heavy use. I don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Running_Fool

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a tire this size in any local stores, but received this quickly with Prime at a reasonable price. I will definitely buy again when I need another bike tire this size.
customer_reviews.author: Travis S

customer_reviews.title: Garbage- don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: My son skidded ONE time & these things fell apart! Didn’t last 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Joe D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Solid Tire Good Tread
customer_reviews.text: This tire is a much better version that what came on my kids bike. The rubber is soft but durable. I would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: Fixed an old bike and these worked great
customer_reviews.text: Very knobby but worked well on a old bike that needed tires.
customer_reviews.author: Stupid People are Annoying

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my son's dirt bike. Very easy to install, fit well, and appears durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Edge1973

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Just a bike tire. Not exceptional but seems likedecent tire.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: When we needed to replace a tire this worked perfectly and the tread pattern was identical to the replaced tire!
customer_reviews.author: Stardomseeker

customer_reviews.title: Good Tires
customer_reviews.text: Tires went on easily and have held up nicely. It's great to find a pair of basic tires that can be shipped rolled up.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Forshee

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Tire was exactly what was in description. Shipping was fast, I received the tire 4 day sooner than what was estimated.
customer_reviews.author: d.hayden

customer_reviews.title: Great bicycle tire
customer_reviews.text: Great bicycle tire. Should have purchased 2 of them. Installed on rear wheel of neighbor Boy's bike. He likes to skid and wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: 1975re5

customer_reviews.title: Came as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to switch out. Seem to be very sturdy/thick rubber. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Good tire.
customer_reviews.text: Came fast, durable against the crazy pokey thorns here in El Paso, and easy to put on. Great tread and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mounted tires on little girls souped up power wheels and improved traction a lot
customer_reviews.author: erik constantine

customer_reviews.title: cut them and used on powerwheels car Work great as fake tread on plastic
customer_reviews.text: didn't use them for a bike, cut them and used on powerwheels car Work great as fake tread on plastic wheels
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace the tires on a Smart Cart. They work well and no more flats, at least for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Frogmore

customer_reviews.title: decnt timers
customer_reviews.text: and they are lasting longer than the stock ones did.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the strider balance bike.
customer_reviews.text: These ended up fitting our son’s Strider balance bike perfectly. And it changes the look of the bike, making it look more like a BMX bike. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice Replacement Tire
customer_reviews.text: This tire replaced the original tire on a jogging stroller. It was easy to get on the rim and is well constructed. It has the knobs, but they are aligned in the center so that it is a very smooth and fast ride. Plus, the knob keep it higher off the ground (and less prone to punctures).
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wore out way too quickly on my Trikke. Had to go back to the Chinese Kenda tire.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! fit perfect. Very happy Gran-daughter back on the trail. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Keno

customer_reviews.title: fits good
customer_reviews.text: no problem putting it on if you have any smarts at all.
customer_reviews.author: randy r.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Took like 5 minutes to install and my kid was back on his bike ready to drift again 😉
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Tire fit the wheel, was easy to install and held air. Time will tell on how well it wears.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Piercefield

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: It's a brand new bike tire with no holes or thorns in it. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: George Willikers

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Taught my kid how to change a bike tire. He did it with a little help.
customer_reviews.author: G T

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size. There's no 12".
customer_reviews.text: When you choose size/color, there are 4 sizes listed. The diameter options are 12, 16, and 20. I ordered the 12" Dia but got 12.5". Had to return it. The description is correct listing it as 12.5 but the size selector is off.
customer_reviews.author: IndustrialZen

customer_reviews.title: Great street traction
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and seems like good quality rubber. Great price.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap random tire for a kids' bike.
customer_reviews.text: Whatever, I bought this becaus eit was cheap, not because it was good. Worked out fine though, wheels keep turning, kids keep riding.

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: Great grip, used it on my foldie bike and love them

customer_reviews.title: Bike Tire
customer_reviews.text: Its a tire. Works like a tire fits, like a tire. Great packaging
customer_reviews.author: Scott Z.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fast
customer_reviews.text: This seller provided an accurate and easy to comprehend listing. I received my product fast and in good order. I saved money in the product price, shipping and with not having to spend fuel to pay more for the same product in store. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: lochmander

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: They have these in Wal-Mart for almost $20 each, great deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tire for my boys Tonka bike. Great value for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size. they not 20"
customer_reviews.text: Pict. Shows 20" but they are 14". No one wants 14". Wrong size.

customer_reviews.title: Great tire after one week
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and a little girl smiling. Works great recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Angel B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for this bike and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: ... go center drive wheels and it runs so much better. Cut the side wall out and they slipped ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these tires on my sons step 2 spin and go center drive wheels and it runs so much better. Cut the side wall out and they slipped on real snug for a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: E. Winn

customer_reviews.title: Too much work
customer_reviews.text: It took forever for me to put on the tire
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Went on real easy and is way better than the stock tire
customer_reviews.text: This is one very tough tire. Went on real easy and is way better than the stock tire.
customer_reviews.author: Slaterson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used these tires to put on a power-wheels for more traction. Just cut metal banding and stretch over power wheels tires. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Chad O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mounted easily and seem to provide good traction on any surface.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great tires look great on my old school redline bike
customer_reviews.author: Brandy McKinsey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good tire, I haven't gotten a flat yet, it's the longest I've gone without a flat.
customer_reviews.author: Priest

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great until the kid started skidding everywhere. Some people's kids these days.......

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with that and do not understand why
customer_reviews.text: I needed 4, but max allowed is 3. Not very happy with that and do not understand why.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Bell Gate very good 12inch tire.
customer_reviews.text: This tire was a perfect fit for my sons 12 inch bike. Great thickness should last a good while. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Somarc

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids bikes
customer_reviews.text: awesome. It fits all those sizes as described 12x1.95 or (54-203)
customer_reviews.author: Macello

customer_reviews.title: josh's tire
customer_reviews.text: great product and has held up well in spite of a 6 year old evel kneivel wanna be, I swear he wil be the death of us,
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Most people will use this for bicycles. I used them as traction aids for my son's 12V electric truck. The stock 'tires' are hard plastic. They have a lot of surface area and would spin and spin. I cut each tire and used self-tapping screws to hold it onto the plastic 'tire'. They work very well. My son can now easily move the grass, leaves and sand. The rear tire traction improved so much that the truck would understeer due to the lack of front traction. I fixed that by ordering more tires and screwing them onto the front tires. Now, all is right with the world.
customer_reviews.author: TZ250

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid tires that perform well for normal trail and road riding
customer_reviews.author: Aron Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Its a tire
customer_reviews.text: It's a tire and fits true to size. I ordered this to replace my daughter's bike tire that was bald and it fit perfect and 14" is hard to find and this wasn't a bad price either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my sons' bike
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my sons' bike! It was easy to replace to old with the new.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Descent Tire, but the item description is incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: The one shipped is not the Bell tire with the Kevlar layer for flat protection. Furthermore, the tire size I ordered was 20x1.75, but received a tire size of 20x2.125. Not a concern for fitment (i.e. the tire fits the rim just fine), but a 2.125 is a thicker tire (i.e. 1.75 has a lower profile).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: too soft tread, wears down quickly, maybe should have got higher r rating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an adequate tire, nothing special. However, ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an adequate tire, nothing special. However, it is the only choice out there in this tire size that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz Jarzecki

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire, but I was using it for a project to fix my son's power wheel wheels and it was too small. I had to cut it, so I cannot. I will say the quality of the tire was awesome. I had to cut it down for this project and had a very hard time cutting it because it was so thick. I think this tire would be perfect for a BMX bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Works great on a kids bike where they're going to probably ...
customer_reviews.text: Less expensive than any other replacement tire I could find locally or online. Works great on a kids bike where they're going to probably wear through the tire in a few months doing hard stops. The kevlar bead means it folds up into a small space, perfect to keep around as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: John Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit on wheel, matched exactly with what was already on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its alright
customer_reviews.text: i got this for a 14" bike, the old tire called for the same exact measurements however .. the tire was too high for the bike so it ended up not working out. :( .. otherwise a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: HMills5

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good. Holding up to use. Can't beat the price. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: 0xDEADBEEF

customer_reviews.title: not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: not at all what i thought. asked if came with tubes, as was told it did, but actually did not. too small for what i wanted. had to return for something better. who rides a bike this small anyway?!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it !
customer_reviews.text: Love it !! I buy it to replace the broken one, it is easy to Change and my boy can ride his bike again!!
customer_reviews.author: sherry

product_meta.title: Bell GATE BMX Tire 20-Inch Black
product_meta.description: The Bell BMX bike tire features a rugged carbon steel bead and layer of DuPont Kevlar to provide extra protection against flats. Tire folds and unfolds without damage.
feature_bullets: Our grippy BMX tread in kids bike sizes
Carbon steel bead allows tire to be folded without damage for easy storage
Aggressive knobby tread for BMX tracks, dirt or pavement

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
